General.Name: Zhejiang Transfar Co Ltd
General.Description: Transfar Zhilian Co., Ltd. engages in the chemicals and logistics business in China. The company offers visual shipping services such as panoramic delivery, capacity pool construction, carrier management, compliance settlement, etc.; LTL trading platforms; base, regional, and shared warehouse management services; highway port city logistics for manufacturing companies, commercial companies, logistics companies, truck drivers, etc.; value-added services such as car after-sales service, oil products, and oil card sales; and payment financial services. It also manufactures and sells butadiene rubber; and sells chemical products, leather, and chemical fiber oils. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Transfar Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Transfar Zhilian Co., Ltd. in November 2016. Transfar Zhilian Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Hangzhou, China. Transfar Zhilian Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Transfar Group Co., Ltd.

2.Name: Ms. Jiangying  Zhu
2.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board of Directors & Director
